item.title: MLOps for Non-ML Engineers 01 - Introduction
item.description: Bixby Creek Bridge on CA-01 highway, Monterey, California Last year I had an opportunity to work with a team of Data Scientists on developing an Enterprise AI/ML practice. As someone who had not interacted at development level with Machine Learning and AI before, I jumped on the chance to learn something new and find a challenge on a new area. The following are a couple of notes (more to myself) of key points I learnt as an engineer with only software development and DevOps experience.
